video.title: Blue Exorcist
video.synopsis: Determined to throw off the curse of being Satan's illegitimate son, Rin enters the True Cross Academy to become an exorcist, just like his mentor.

episodes.synopsis: As his twin brother, Yukio, starts school at the prestigious True Cross Academy, Rin begins to worry about his future.
episodes.title: The Devil Resides in Human Souls

episodes.synopsis: Warning him that he must never draw the Koma Sword, Shiro gives it to Rin and hides him in the monastery basement.
episodes.title: Gehenna Gate

episodes.synopsis: Vowing to become an exorcist, Rin is taken to True Cross Academy by the mysterious Mephisto, a friend of Rin's late father.
episodes.title: Brothers

episodes.synopsis: When Yukio takes on a case, Rin tags along with him to the Exorcism Supply Shop, where he meets a girl with ailing legs, tending her garden.
episodes.title: The Garden of Amahara

episodes.synopsis: Suguro is striving to become an exorcist so he can restore his family's temple, but being classmates with a slacker like Rin is intolerable.
episodes.title: A Boy from the Cursed Temple

episodes.synopsis: Taking Yukio's advice, Rin starts cooking in the dorm kitchen, preparing lunch the night before. But in the morning, all the food has vanished!
episodes.title: The Phantom Chef

episodes.synopsis: To overcome her shyness, Shiemi secretly vows to make friends but is hindered by her clumsiness.
episodes.title: A Flock of Plovers

episodes.synopsis: Crushed by her failure to save her best friend, Izumo lashes out at Suguro. When their bickering escalates, the whole class is sent to detention.
episodes.title: Now a Certain Man Was Sick...

episodes.synopsis: Fighting together for the first time, Rin and the others face a harrowing attack and are confronted by Mephisto and the Cram School teachers.
episodes.title: Memories

episodes.synopsis: When the familiar of the Knights of the True Cross goes berserk, Yukio is summoned to handle the crisis.
episodes.title: Black Cat

episodes.synopsis: When Rin, Shima and Izumo meet a boy named Yohei, they learn about the Demon of the Deep Seas, who took his father's life.
episodes.title: Demon of the Deep Seas

episodes.synopsis: The class investigates ghost sightings at an amusement park, where Rin and Shiemi find the specter of a child.
episodes.title: A Game of Tag

episodes.synopsis: Dragged off to the underground base, Rin learns that Shura was once Shiro's disciple -- and that Shura has targeted him for elimination.
episodes.title: Proof

episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation begins, but there's no break for Rin and the other ExWires as they must participate in a drill to get ready for real combat.
episodes.title: A Fun Camping Trip

episodes.synopsis: Suguro's joint strategy pays off for the ExWires. But later, a giant moth demon appears and attacks Rin.
episodes.title: Act of Kindness

episodes.synopsis: Consumed by the power of his flames, Rin goes berserk! He regains control of himself, only to be captured by the current Paladin, Angel.
episodes.title: The Wager

episodes.synopsis: As the hearing drags on, the Order is unable to decide Rin's fate as Mephisto has proclaimed him "a weapon for counterattacking Satan.
episodes.title: Temptation

episodes.synopsis: When a demon swoops in on Rin as he's training to master his flames, the Cram School members are sent to investigate how it infiltrated the academy.
episodes.title: Gufu

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Izumo's birthday is just around the corner, the Exorcism Cram School students decide to throw her a surprise party.
episodes.title: An Ordinary Day

episodes.synopsis: Southern Cross Monastery, where Rin and Yukio grew up, comes under attack by a mysterious assailant, who leaves behind a cryptic message.
episodes.title: Mask

episodes.synopsis: The assailant has escaped, but things are getting back to normal after the monastery attack. Meanwhile, Yukio receives a surprise visitor.
episodes.title: The Secret Garden

episodes.synopsis: In light of the recent incidents, Mephisto and the order's Supreme Advisors are ousted, paving the way for Ernst to become pope.
episodes.title: Demon Hunting

episodes.synopsis: Ernst is scheming to invoke the Gehenna Gate by using Rin's blood. To protect his wounded brother, Yukio offers to take his place.
episodes.title: Truth

episodes.synopsis: Hordes of demons spill out of Gehenna Gate and randomly attack the people of True Cross Academy Town.
episodes.title: Satan's Spawn

episodes.synopsis: With help from Shura and Angel, Rin and Yukio attack the gigantic Gehenna Gate. But it's an uphill battle against Satan's overwhelming power.
episodes.title: Stop, Time

episodes.synopsis: The theft of the Impure King's Left Eye disrupts Rin's training. To protect the Right Eye, the exorcists head to Kyoto.
episodes.title: Small Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: The group arrives in Kyoto and heads to Suguro's family inn. Most of the field office staff are injured, and everyone is under suspicion.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows

episodes.synopsis: Yaozo calls a meeting to attempt to root out the traitor in the Myoda sect, with suspicion falling on Suguro's father Tatsuma.
episodes.title: Suspicion Will Raise Bogies

episodes.synopsis: Suguro spots Juzo entering the Deep Keep, and overhears Mamushi declaring herself to be Todo's partisan. Suguro is still suspicious of his father.
episodes.title: Act of Treachery

episodes.synopsis: Rin is thrown into solitary confinement, where Yukio reads him a letter from Tatsuma. With both Eyes stolen, Yaozo calls a meeting.
episodes.title: Mysterious Connections

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuma's letter tells the story of how Fujimoto obtained the Koma Sword years ago. In the present, Todo and Mamushi arrive at the Goma Chapel.
episodes.title: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing

episodes.synopsis: The Impure King lives again and the Vatican has sentenced Rin to death. His classmates try to break him out, and it all comes down to Shiemi.
episodes.title: Like a Fire Burning Bright

episodes.synopsis: As the miasma spreads through Kyoto, everyone heads for Rakuhoku. Rin and his classmates look for Tatsuma, and Yukio encounters a changed Todo.
episodes.title: From Father to Son

episodes.synopsis: Todo taunts Yukio about his true feelings towards his brother. Suguro accepts a contract with the Goha-en, and he and Rin search for the Impure King.
episodes.title: Through Thick and Thin

episodes.synopsis: The Impure King emerges as reinforcements arrive to help Yukio. Suguro, Rin and Kuro are trapped inside the barrier, and Rin can't draw the sword.
episodes.title: Unbowed and Unbroken

episodes.synopsis: Todo just won't stay dissolved. Though Rin manages to draw the Koma Sword, the Impure King is too strong. When all hope seems lost, Ucchusma appears.
episodes.title: Shine Bright as the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Rin's blue flames have cleansed the area. In the aftermath, it's time for sightseeing, a heart-to-heart talk, and a discussion about Rin's future.
episodes.title: Candid and Open
